programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ngorongoro: Born of Fire
programme.desc: Ngorongoro is thought to have formed about 2.5 million years ago from a large volcano, whose cone collapsed inward after a major eruption. This fertile land is full of wildlife, from cunning hyena and proud lions to vast herds of wildebeest and elephants.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Namibia: Sands of Time
programme.desc: Namibia is an arid, rough land. However, it has been inhabited for thousands of years, by people as well as animals, and shows no sign of losing popularity with either.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Sahara: Life on the Edge

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Congo: the Untamed Heart

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Colide

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women: Teen Killers
programme.desc: They were too young to drink or vote but they were not too young to commit the most brutal of crimes. Some were driven by pure curiosity: how would it feel to take a life?

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: Deadly Women

programme.title: The FBI Files: The C-11 Squad

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Three's Company
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Smackdown of Baby Lyssa
programme.desc: After meeting with the cosigner on a bond for a man named John, Dog and the Posse hatch a plan to lure him to a high rise apartment. But when night falls, their plan leaves a member of the team alone and in harm's way!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bonds of Love
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are finally getting married! They've been together for more than ten years but Dog is determined, as he puts it, to "marry his common law wife the Christian way.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Playing Possum
programme.desc: Tim's got a big problem. Owen has failed to appear in court. He's on bond for serious drug charges and now Tim could lose $30,000 if he doesn't catch Owen. With Dog's help he tries to track down the co-signer but they come up dry.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Short Handed
programme.desc: Dog's target today has a history of violence, and apparently plans to re-locate without notifying the proper authorities. Unfortunately the team is missing a key player, Duane Lee is MIA today distracted by his new lady love.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Hometown Hero
programme.desc: Beat creates a cozy cabin in Germany, while Peter and Sr. win a Guinness World Record with their jaw-dropping one-of-a-kind log car, and Joel takes on a difficult build made even tougher with a rookie slinging logs.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Heaven’s Gate
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. feels the heat to recreate the cozy log home a British Columbia couple lost to a fire. Meanwhile, Peter hopes for a ticket to heaven by building a covered entrway for the local church.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Under the Gun
programme.desc: While Beat constructs a luxury fishing lodge in northern British Columbia, Bryan Jr. is covered into giving the local gun shop a much-needed facelift.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cowboy Confidential
programme.desc: Beat and Andre are lassoed into building an elaborate carved archway for the Williams Lake Stampede. Meanwhile, Joel wrangles a rookie crew to construct a vacation home in the wilds of Wisconsin.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Going Fishing
programme.desc: Dominican Republic has been combating narcotraffic for decades, but now an influx of traffickers with loads of cocaine has wrecked havoc on the island

programme.title: Drug Wars: Hot Pursuit
programme.desc: After tracking down the Venezuelan Cartel boss in the Dominican Republic, local law enforcement prepares an operation to intercept his fast boat full of drugs heading towards the island

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Family Guy
programme.desc: Jazmin's final straw was when Darren brought another woman over and lied about Jazmin being his sister and his daughter being his niece. Darren feels he's a good father who pays the bills and doesn't need to answer to anyone if he's not married.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Alcohol
programme.desc: Nikkinba says Muriel is controlling and constantly breaking his phones. He wouldn't return Muriel's calls for days until he quit his job and said that he's leaving her to live in North Carolina. Can they settle down or will he buy a one-way ticket?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Woman
programme.desc: Rechene Hall and Itarous Parker have been together for over 4 years and are engaged, but Rechene doesn’t trust Itarous because of his lying. Itarous claims Rechene is too immature for a relationship. Is this couple headed down the break-up aisle?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Can't Buy Love
programme.desc: Chimira gets lavish vacations, gifts and a designer wardrobe from Bennie, but suspects he is cheating on her. Bennie says she should be grateful for her good life. Can Bennie learn to give his time and support instead of luxuries and an empty home?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The No Nah Nah Episode
programme.desc: An exhausted Nick resists Suzanne's romantic advances, leading her to worry about the health of their relationship.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Get Together Episode
programme.desc: Nick recommends throwing a social event with family and friends in a bid to strengthen family ties, but his sloppy planning results in chaos.

programme.title: Boomerang: Episode 1
programme.desc: New Age marketing professionals Bryson Broyer and Simone Graham look for ways to create their own paths to success while trying to renovate the legacy of their parents: The Graham Agency.

programme.title: Paranormal State: They Only Come Out at Night
programme.desc: Once night falls in a quaint?New England Town, a police officer's family is terrorized by demons.?PRS arrives just in time with the family ready to vacate their family home, rather than suffer the advances of these spirit creatures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Beer, Wine and Spirits
programme.desc: Brian's bar has a cranky customer who's got a bad habit of breaking wine glasses. Charlie has been dead since prohibition.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Sex Dungeon
programme.desc: Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey and Chad Calek join PRS for this unusual case of a sprawling mansion on Greyhaven Island near Detroit. Ken, the owner, hears voices and banging and it has him feeling both watched and cursed; a prisoner in his own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Messenger
programme.desc: Kelli and her husband Riley are frightened in their coastal Oregon home. They are plagued by a headless apparition and often hear mysterious noises that resemble cries for help from the dark corners of their house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Drowned
programme.desc: Kim and her family have been frightened out of their seaside Maryland home. Multiple family members have reported sightings of children with purple lips and strange noises emanating from the nearby creek.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Knickerbocker
programme.desc: PRS checks into the Knickerbocker Hotel in Linesville, Pennsylvania where the owners are reporting strange noises and the appearance of phantom children in some of the rooms.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Most Haunted: 30 East Drive_PT2
programme.desc: The team continue their most threatening investigation yet and for some they will be scared for life mentally and physically. The most violent poltergeist in the world is ready for a fight...but who wins?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Armley Mills
programme.desc: Once the centre of industry Armley Mills is now a museum that is said to house the phantoms of many a lost soul. From children who were caught in the machinery to a bad tempered floorwalker who doesn’t like people in his mill.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Black Country Living Museum
programme.desc: The team have a whole village to investigate with results that amazed the all. With a playful spirit communicating through the Ouija board and the EVP machine at the same time the team seem to have their first two-way conversation with the dead.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Carr House
programme.desc: Part of a once splendorous manor and a history that goes back as far as Robin Hood, Carr House is the sight of many a paranormal occurrence.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT1
programme.desc: What was once a private home before becoming a sanctuary for the elderly, the abandoned Hill House is now an eerie shadow of its former glory, that houses empty rooms, strange noises and a plethora of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Hill House_PT2
programme.desc: Part one saw the team seemingly getting stalked by something, and in this part it shows its hand.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Torch
programme.desc: Tragedy occurs when a Neo-Nazi disputes the Holocaust with the son of a death camp survivor.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Sail Away
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark assist a novelist who's given up. Also, they motivate the man's grandson, who has yet to tap into his literary potential.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Children's Children
programme.desc: A reporter uncovers a secret about the past of a woman who runs a home for unwed mothers.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Friends

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Special Love - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark persuade a youngster with Down's Syndrome to join the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny is throwing himself into his work after the death of his father, and has applied for the role of State Vet. However, Danny's attempts to involve Thabo in the first phase of the Lion Breeding Project lead to Du Plessis feeling like an outsider.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: It is Danny's first day as State Vet and when he helps rescue some smuggled animals he feels he's making a difference. However, he discovers the role isn't going to be all plain sailing.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny's first big project as State Vet is a major animal translocation, and he is desperate to impress. Meanwhile, whilst Alice is out in the bush treating an injured zebra, she is stalked by lions. She makes it back to her jeep in time but is shaken up.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Alice is still suffering from a loss of nerve after her close shave with the lions and so Danny tries to help her overcome her problems – the Leopard's Den lions have produced their first cub and he needs Alice back in the saddle.

programme.title: Quantum Leap

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into what he believes to be a vampire, and must keep away from his new bride (Shae D'Lynn) to prevent himself from biting her. With Dean Stockwell.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes Marilyn Monroe's (Susan Griffiths) chauffeur to keep her from committing suicide, but Marilyn's new secretary (Liz Vassey) may prevent Sam's rescue. With Dean Stockwell.

programme.desc: Moesha is flying high after she gets a job tutoring one of the basketball team’s star players until she finds out what kind of game he really wants to play.

programme.desc: Things get tense at the Mitchell house when Frank discovers Moesha has been taking birth control pills – and he’s the last to know.

programme.title: Moesha: Just Above My Head
programme.desc: Moesha finds her history teacher’s remarks racially offensive, but fears that confronting him might affect her grade and cost Niecy her scholarship.

programme.title: Moesha: A Den Is A Terrible Thing To Waste

programme.title: Moesha: Isn’t She Lovely?

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: London, Wiltshire Revisits

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Derbyshire

programme.title: Location, Location, Location: Wiltshire
programme.desc: One couple want room for 4 children and a 4x4 business -whilst the other want a place that will 'give them a big hug' whenever they walk through the door!

programme.title: Dynasty: Cliffs
programme.desc: Middle Eastern oilman Farouk, anxious for vengeance against Blake, tells Nick that Carrington is responsible for the death of his brother. Nick attacks Blake, who is left unconscious at the bottom of a deep ravin.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Plea
programme.desc: Krystle finds Blake in the mountains and gets him to the hospital. Nick Toscanni disappears. Cecil is also brought to the hospital, and he's very weak. A police investigation is started to find the baby.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Roof
programme.desc: Michael goes to Denver to find out who he is. Alexis and Cecil plan a wedding in the hospital. Claudia disappears and Blake suspects her of kidnapping the baby. There's an exiting drama on the roof of a tall building.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Wedding
programme.desc: The baby is recovered from the real kidnapper, Alfred Grimes, and it turns out he's the father of Roger Grimes. Fallon fires Susan. Claudia leaves for a sanitarium. Fallon starts looking for a job. Blake gives her his hotel La Mirada.

programme.title: Dynasty: The Will
programme.desc: Cecil leaves his estate and Colbyco to Jeff and Alexis. He also reveals his "Rhinewood" game to Blake at the reading of his will. Blake suspects Alexis of being a part of it.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.65

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.24
programme.desc: Babysitter accused of falsely claiming ex-employer smoked marijuana in front of child/Gallery owner denies scamming customer, claims heirloom sapphire sold for alleged ten dollars.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.229

programme.desc: Man accuses ex-lover of sending explicit photos/Sued for damaging ex-girlfriend's Mustang in accident.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.107

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.188

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.66
programme.desc: A woman and her niece wage war over impound fees on a Chevy Trailblazer, the cost of college tuition, and $92 dollars allegedly ‘stolen’ by a raccoon.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.43
programme.desc: Teenager steals mother's checkbook, buys car; parents sue custom shop owner/Woman sues ex-lover for leaving her for mother of his child; he claims bitterness, she alleges owed money.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.13
programme.desc: A woman claims her ex-boyfriend asked her to pawn her jewelry to pay their bills; he says she offered to do it/A loan to pay DUI bills is disputed by ex-lovers, one of whom claims it was a birthday gift.

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.122
programme.desc: Woman and niece sue niece's ex-friend over wrecked Jeep Commander/injured woman sues for nude photos posted online/woman sues estranged daughter-in-law for loan to recover repossessed car.

programme.desc: Man and stepson suing ex-friend for iPod and necklace face weakened case due to internet slander. Woman demands ex-fiancé pay Home Depot card charges; he claims items used to fix her home.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Island Nations
programme.desc: Though many are small in stature, they have punched well above their weight on the global stage. Some are rooted in ancient history, while others are only just beginning to realize their full potential.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Timeless Cities & Towns
programme.desc: These cities and towns are special places where the past coexists with the present, creating cultures totally unique to their people and their part of the world and adhering to ancient traditions and while introducing modern innovations.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Remote Cities
programme.desc: Brave the frontiers of the world’s most remote cities. More than distant trading posts and isolated regional hubs, cities like Alice Springs, Jaipur and even Las Vegas serve as gateways to the wild places of the Earth.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: Arthur: Postcards from Buster, Parts I & II
programme.desc: Buster's going to New York City to meet his dad Bo, and the Reads are coming with him! He's thrilled ... but won't his mom miss him? But, Bitzi gives him a present that will let him share his exciting trip with her--a video camera!

programme.title: The Rhythm and Roots of Arthur
programme.desc: Pack your bags, buckle your seatbelts, and get ready for an ARTHUR road trip to the family farm! Arthur’s Great-Grand Uncle Theo is celebrating his 85th birthday, so the Reads (and Buster) are off to Ohio to join in the festivities.

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Spaces Out/The Long Road Home
programme.desc: Inspired by footage of the moon landing, Buster wants to go to outer space someday! For now, it'd be cool to build and launch a rocket! Then, after costing Lakewood Elementary the win in a relay race, George wants to redeem himself.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last Tough Customer/Brain's Chess Mess
programme.desc: The Tough Customers realize it's time to quit bullying and set out to find a new hobby--but can Molly ever truly change her ways? And Brain starts a chess club at school to improve his game and beat Los Dedos, the local chess master.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Sells Out/Mind Your Manners
programme.desc: To earn the money for a new video game, Arthur decides to sell his old toys through his school's Web site. The Tibble Twins want to take Grandmother out to dinner, but she'd rather stay home. Is it because of their terrible table manners?

programme.title: Arthur: Pick a Car, Any Car/Jenna's Bedtime Blues
programme.desc: The family car is broken, and so is Arthur's heart. How can Mom and Dad even think of replacing it? It’s Muffy's annual slumber party, and Jenna is finally invited! But what if the other girls discover that she's an occasional bed-wetter?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Babysits/Arthur's Cousin Catastrophe
programme.desc: You think running a marathon is hard? Try babysitting for the Terrible Tibble Twins. Next, Arthur's family is hosting the once-a-year-is-more-than-enough family reunion. But a major thunderstorm turns this into a reunion to remember.

programme.title: Arthur: Making Conversation/A Cloudy Day
programme.desc: Talking to adults makes George want to hide! When he learns he must go to a grown-up party, he turns to his friends for help. Then, Arthur and his friends learn that old silent films can be just as much fun as the movies they’re used to.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: The second episode starts on the morning of the 22nd of June 1941 when the Germans launched operation Barbarossa, the code name for the invasion of the Soviet Union.

programme.title: NEW: Great Tank Battles of World War II
programme.desc: This first part of the series introduces the first tanks being deployed on the battlefields in northern France during WWI and describes the devastating effect these steel monsters had on an infantry confronted with them for the very first time.

programme.title: Gestapo: Hitler's Secret Police
programme.desc: Hermann Goering’s Secret State Police were tasked to arrest and torture confessions and information from supposed enemies of the Reich.

programme.title: Embedded 45' - Shooting War in Germany: Embedded 45 - Shooting War in Germany 2
programme.desc: This second episode covers the last week of March to late April. The cameramen covered many stories of victory and defeat, death and liberation. Faces of despair and joy, scenes of war and peace.

programme.title: Embedded 45' - Shooting War in Germany: Embedded 45 - Shooting War in Germany 1
programme.desc: This first episode covers the last week of February to late March. When American troops started their final invasion of Nazi Germany in February 1945, U.S. Army cameramen were at their side.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Mike & Caroline
programme.desc: Mike fell in love with Caroline online. He grew suspicious when she continually evaded meeting him, yet left notes at his car. Is Caroline an imposter or is she just afraid?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jeff & Megan
programme.desc: After a string of bad luck with women, Jeff believes he has finally found his dream girl Megan. However, Megan is starting to sound off Catfish alarms.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Brittany & Bryon
programme.desc: Brittany finds love online with Bryon, a marine who may get deployed again to Iraq, she seeks Nev and Max's help before she runs out of time to discover if the perfect military man is real. (S4, ep19)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Devan & Rylan
programme.desc: For shy Devan, meeting Rylan was love at first click. Devan wants to believe that Rylan is marriage material but her suspicious behaviour is leaving him with doubts. (S4, ep18)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Joanna was about to meet her online love in the flesh, but a crazy night in Vegas caused the whole relationship to go sour. Now she's enlisted Nev to help track down her former flame. (S5, ep8)

programme.title: The Hills: What Happens In Vegas... / What Goes Around
programme.desc: After the drama at Jason's engagement party, Lauren needs to leave The Hills for a while. What better way to escape than to head to Vegas to surprise Brody on his 24th birthday? (S3, ep9)

programme.title: The City: Its All Who You Know
programme.desc: Whitney goes behind Kelly's back to show her fashion designs to Bergdorf Goodman. Olivia shocks Erin by using her fashion world connections to succeed at her biggest ELLE task. (S1, ep16)

programme.title: The City: Meet the Fackelmayers
programme.desc: Whitney meets some cute brothers. Olivia thrives at an ELLE Magazine cocktail party &amp; Erin reminds her that the fashion business isn't just about who you know but what you know. (S1, ep17)

programme.title: The City: Hit It And Quit It
programme.desc: Whitney grows cautious about Freddie just as her ex, Jay, comes back into the picture. Roxy clashes with Olivia when People's Revolution and Elle join forces to put on a party. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: The City: Weekend at Freddie's
programme.desc: On a weekend trip to the Hamptons, Whitney finds out some surprising news about Freddie. Erin has to pick up the slack when Olivia drops the ball on a big interview assignment. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: The City: Friends And Foe-Workers
programme.desc: When Whitney fights with Roxy at Miami Fashion Week, Kelly questions if they should work together. Erin expects Joe to come down hard on Olivia, but things don't go as she hoped. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: The City: Forget About Boys
programme.desc: Whitney and Roxy go on a series of dates ending in a blow-up at a club. When Olivia gets preferential treatment on a photoshoot, Erin reveals the real reasons she dislikes Olivia. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: The City: If You Want Something Done Right...
programme.desc: Whitney lets Roxy work on a big project, even though Kelly thinks Roxy can't be trusted. When Olivia comes up short for a new assignment, she and Erin have a huge fight. (s1, ep22)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: The Truth Will Set You Free
programme.desc: Mike decides he can wait no longer to reveal 'the truth' to Snooki's boyfriend. Pauly, Vinny, and Deena find it difficult to be the single roommates in the Shore House. (S5, ep9)

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: Fury Planet
programme.desc: On the Fury Planet, a land where everyone is quick to pick a fight, Tetsuro slams into a tofu vendor as an assassin who works for Duke Mech, a friend of Count Mecha, targets him.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: Bitten Planet of Stopped Space-time
programme.desc: The gang encounters the space warrior Edmond inside of the 999. His hometown, Sweet, Sweet Planet is shaped like an apple that has had bites taken out of it.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: Ulatress Screw Mountain
programme.desc: Ulatres, a planet that specializes in screws. There, a woman named Lasen takes a liking to Tetsuro and imprisons him in the hopes of them living together.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: The Witch of Plated City  Part One
programme.desc: Plated City, a planet where people are considered poor if they aren't plated in gold. There, Maetel has her suitcase stolen by Wheel Lock, a young boy who wants to get plated.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: The Witch of Plated City Part Two
programme.desc: Wheel Lock's mother is against the tradition of plating and is trying to form a resistance. As her dying wish, she asks Wheel Lock to continue the fight against gold plating.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: The Great Chief Cicropros
programme.desc: In a ghost colony where no one is supposed to live, Tetsuro and the gang meet Dr. Cicropros and a legion of his clones.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: Mii-kuns Mansion of Life
programme.desc: They say the planet named Mii-kun's Mansion of Life is a flower and animal-filled planet where the souls of beloved pets of children are brought to rest.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: The Empire of the Cowardly Elder
programme.desc: The 999 is in really bad shape on the Planet of the Cowardly Elder! And it's the doing of the cowardly president of the planet who trusts no one, Delmukade.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: Kasumi of the Mist Capitol
programme.desc: The suitcase with Tetsuro and Maetel's passes is stolen. However, the thief collapses while making their escape.

programme.title: Galaxy Express 999: The Chief of the Spherical Housing Complex  Part One
programme.desc: Maetel is abducted by the Chief as soon as they arrive at the Spherical Housing Complex, a complex of spherical houses.

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Ash, Brock, and Misty get sidetracked on their way to Viridian City when all of their belongings mysteriously disappear. While searching for their missing things, they find themselves mixed up in a close encounter that’s really out of this world!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Our heroes make their way to Viridian City, where Ash hopes to earn the Earth Badge. They get to the Gym just in time to see his rival, Gary, being defeated by an unknown Pokémon—and Gary insists that it's evil!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: On their way back to Pallet Town, our heroes encounter a runaway Mr. Mime. Ash disguises himself as another Mr. Mime so he can get close. When Team Rocket strikes, will they catch the right Mr. Mime?

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Our heroes find themselves at a fork in the road and decide to climb a steep and dangerous mountain. Pikachu gets lost, and they must all work together to find it, stay warm, and weather a storm.

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: On a visit to Professor Oak’s house, Ash runs into Gary, and they talk about the upcoming Pokémon League. Professor Oak says they should learn from each other rather than competing, and that teamwork pays off when Team Rocket attacks!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Ash and his mother take a vacation to Seafoam Island. While he's there, he's looking for the programmer of the Pokédex to learn about the peculiar evolution of SlowPoké. Team Rocket's bumbling brings to light this surprising mystery!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: When Ash wipes out during a surfing attempt, Victor rescues him and tells him about Humungadunga, a giant wave that sweeps through every 20 years. Can Ash and Pikachu give Victor the confidence he needs to catch the giant wave?

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Back in Pallet Town, Ash, and friends meet Florinda, who works at the local nursery. Her Gloom won't evolve, so she’s afraid she's not training it properly. When Team Rocket attacks, everyone sees just how strong a Pokémon can become!

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: Everyone wants to become the star when a famous director arrives in town! Ash, Brock, Misty, and Team Rocket are working hard to ensure their Pokémon will be the ones to star opposite Wigglytuff in his movie as he solely desires them.

programme.title: Pokemon: Adventures in the Orange Islands
programme.desc: When the gang attends the premiere of 'Pokémon in Love,' Meowth looks back on his painful past. He shares the story of his life before Team Rocket, including how he learned to walk and talk like a human.

programme.title: StarTalk: Down to a Science
programme.desc: Famed astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson teams up with notable experts to spotlight the most pressing topics that face society.

programme.title: StarTalk Cosmic Queries
programme.desc: Renowned astrophysicist Neil deGrasse Tyson and other top science minds take on fan questions about life and the universe; uncovering a new mind-bending topic each season, from space and physics to nature.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: The Birthday
programme.desc: The twins' first birthday together leaves Tamera's best friend feeling left out, and Ray locked in an argument with Lisa over his parenting methods.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Love Strikes
programme.desc: Fearing they'll be separated forever if Ray and Lisa marry other people, Tia and Tamera plot to derail Ray's new romance.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Mothers & Other Strangers
programme.desc: When Lisa's disapproving mother comes for a visit, Ray agrees to pose as her husband.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: The Concert
programme.desc: After their parents forbid them to attend a rap concert, the twins sneak out of the house to meet their idol anyway.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Hair Today
programme.desc: Tamera's glamorous new look gets her into a snobby clique -- but threatens her relationship with Tia, who's been snubbed by the same crowd.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Get a Job
programme.desc: Bored with their jobs at Ray's limousine company, the twins secretly start working at a burger stand and quickly learn the perils of trying to be in two places at the same time.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Joeys Choice
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera face "double trouble" when the same guy unknowingly asks them both out on the same date!

programme.title: Sister, Sister: A Tall Tale
programme.desc: Prom night could wind up being a date with disaster when Tia and Tamera's escorts behave badly, and Roger's date towers over him.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Its a Love Thang
programme.desc: Love is in the air when Tamera, Lisa, and Ray all have close encounters of the romantic kind.

programme.title: Sister, Sister: Free Billy
programme.desc: Tia and Tamera rescue a pig who's being mistreated by its owner and attempt to secretly stash the "porker" at home.

programme.title: Sister, Sister
programme.desc: While recovering from "twin appendectomies," Tia and Tamera go in search of hospital records that could reveal the identities of their biological parents.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Joanne Dennehy
programme.desc: Dermot Murnaghan returns to uncover the truth behind the horrific crimes of Peterborough serial killer Joanna Dennehy.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Sally Anne Bowman
programme.desc: A look at the murder of 18-year-old Sally Anne Bowman, who was stabbed in Croydon in 2005. With interviews with her family and detectives who solved the case.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Steven Wright
programme.desc: A closer look at the crimes of Steve Wright, who was dubbed 'The Suffolk Strangler' after murdering five women who worked as prostitutes in Ipswich in 2006.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Gemma McCluskie
programme.desc: The harrowing story of EastEnders actress Gemma McCluskie, who was murdered by her older brother in the flat they shared in east London in 2012.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Stephen Port
programme.desc: A chilling look at the crimes of Stephen Port, the east London serial killer who poisoned four young men with lethal doses of a date rape drug.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Karaoke-Dokee
programme.desc: Joan and Maya are appalled to find Lynn singing for money on the streets of L.A. She claims she’s got a paying gig at a local club, but that night, they’re aghast to find she’s the warm-up act at a karaoke bar.

programme.title: Girlfriends: He Had a Dream
programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) begins to struggle with the responsibilities of homeownership and taking care of Jabari (Kendre Berry) while Darnell (Khalil Kain) is in Florida working for NASCAR.

programme.title: Girlfriends: I'll Have a Blue Line Christmas
programme.desc: Lynn (Persia White) is crushed when she receives a call from Big Boi (guest-starring as himself) saying that he is at a creative crossroads with the record company and he won’t be able to use her music.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Wrong Side of the Tracks
programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) fears that Jabari (Kendre Berry) is growing up too fast after she and Darnell (Khalil Kain) witness an interaction between him and a young girl.

programme.title: Girlfriends: I Want My Baby Back
programme.desc: Maya (Golden Brooks) fears that Jabari (Kendre Berry) is growing up too fast after she and Darnell (Khalil Kain) witness an interaction between him and a young girl.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Hot for Preacher
programme.desc: When Lynn (Persia White) meets Eldon Perry (guest star Kadeem Hardison), an attractive guy at a club where she is singing, but she becomes conflicted about dating him when she discovers he is a Baptist minister.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Time to Man Up
programme.desc: During an evening out, Maya and Darnell befriend Alicia and Ray a new couple living in their neighborhood. When Maya witnesses an intense moment between the couple, she suspects that Ray is abusing Alicia.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Willie Or Won't He III: This Time It's Personal
programme.desc: After years of on-again, off-again dating and a pair of broken engagements, William and Monica finally tie the knot. At the reception, Robert Dooling, one of William’s biggest clients, thanks him for delaying his honeymoon to oversee an important merger.

programme.title: Girlfriends: What Had Happened Was...
programme.desc: After Aaron and Joan experience an uncomfortable moment when they run into one of Aaron's ex-girlfriends, they decide to discuss their past relationships with one another to avoid future awkward moments.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Church Lady
programme.desc: After splitting from Eldon over his objection to pre-marital sex, Lynn longs to get back together. She feels they share a special connection, but Eldon doesn’t appreciate Lynn’s attempts to seduce him.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A Dingo Ate My Dream House
programme.desc: Tired of all the inconveniences of living in the suburbs, Darnell (Khalil Kain) suggests to Maya (Golden Brooks) they should move back to the city, but Maya disagrees and does not want to give up her new home.

programme.title: Then Came You
programme.desc: A lonely widow plans a trip around the world with her husband's ashes, to visit the places they loved in the movies. The first stop on the journey changes her life forever.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: While fighting in Vietnam, Dalton hears his girlfriend has dumped him so decides to fly to get her back. AWOL from the war zone, he has seven days to get back to the US, change his girlfriend's mind and make it back to Vietnam without anyone noticing

programme.title: The Librarian: Quest for the Spear
programme.desc: As a means of finding the legendary book known as the Key of Solomon, Flynn pairs with a brainy archaeologist to first acquire the map legend. Unfortunately, they must elude the sinister General Samir and the ulterior plans of Flynn's uncle.

programme.title: Mr. D: Staff Hangover
programme.desc: Morning assembly reveals the Xavier staff in rough shape. Last night’s staff party went late and got messy.

programme.title: Mr. D: President Jimmy
programme.desc: Gerry becomes unexpectedly embroiled in the school’s student council election and is forced to seek the help of an old foe.

programme.title: Mr. D: Callaghan’s Daughter
programme.desc: Callaghan’s daughter is in town visiting, and after seeing her old graduation photo, Gerry wants take her out on a date.

programme.title: Mr. D: Dating Maya Student
programme.desc: Gerry’s former pupil, Maya is back at Xavier as a student teacher and Gerry is having difficulty accepting her as an adult.

programme.title: Mr. D: Short Stocked
programme.desc: Gerry and Bill’s house they rent is up for sale and Gerry uses the advice of a market-savvy student raise enough money for a down payment.

programme.title: Mr. D: Corporal Punishment
programme.desc: Gerry’s father Francis visits Xavier, and Gerry decides to take a page from his father’s book when dealing with an insubordinate student.

programme.title: Mr. D: Lockdown
programme.desc: After encountering an attractive police officer during a lockdown drill, Gerry is determined to see her again.

programme.title: Mr. D: Gerry’s Kid
programme.desc: Gerry bumps into an old fling and her daughter and becomes convinced he’s met the child he never knew he had.

programme.title: TripTank: The W.A.N.G.
programme.desc: Versus invades a British wedding, Gary faces the prospect of a gruesome surgery, a bird reveals its pecker, and an office worker harbors a terrifying secret.

programme.title: TripTank: Let Me Transfer You
programme.desc: A car salesman pulls out all the stops, the gang surprises Gary on a camping trip, the Easter Bunny finds himself in the wrong house, and Beth has a religious experience.
